pullRequest.title: Reschedule dialog: Add Warnings
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose / Description
Rescheduling cards is not well defined - add some more warnings
Fixes
Fixes #6370
Fixes #5242
Approach
Add text-based warnings
How Has This Been Tested?
On my phone: is:new, is:learn and is:review
is:learn had no change


Checklist

 You have not changed whitespace unnecessarily (it makes diffs hard to read)
 You have a descriptive commit message with a short title (first line, max 50 chars).
 Your code follows the style of the project (e.g. never omit braces in if statements)
 You have commented your code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
 You have performed a self-review of your own code

nodes.bodyText:
My naive reaction to this is "250% of what?" - I don't think most users will understand the exact effect here
It is perhaps a difficult idea to express but I'd like the warning to work for a user that has no idea what's going on.
Unrelated, I think the phrasing should begin something like "Rescheduling will also reset the ease ..." because it's a side effect that comes as a package deal, if I understand correctly, not as something separate from what the user is trying to do?
